welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Howell, a charming town known for its friendly community, beautiful parks, and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Monmouth Executive Airport offers a modern and comfortable experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robert J. Miller Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robert J. Miller Airport handles all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
